description:
As a developer
  I want to create errors easily using the error factory
  So that I can handle errors consistently across the application

steps.name: I have the error factory imported
I create a "notFound" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 404
the error code should be "NOT_FOUND"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "unauthorized" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 401
the error code should be "UNAUTHORIZED"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "forbidden" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 403
the error code should be "FORBIDDEN"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "validation" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 400
the error code should be "VALIDATION_ERROR"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "conflict" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 409
the error code should be "CONFLICT"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "unprocessable" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 422
the error code should be "UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "rateLimit" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 429
the error code should be "RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED"
I have the error factory imported
I create a "internal" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 500
the error code should be "INTERNAL_ERROR"

elements.name: Create not found error with resource and identifier

steps.name: I have the error factory imported
I create a not found error with:
the error message should be "User with identifier '123' not found"
the error meta should contain:
I have the error factory imported
I create a "unavailable" error
the error should be an instance of AppError
the error status code should be 503
the error code should be "SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE"

elements.name: Create not found error without identifier

steps.name: I have the error factory imported
I create a not found error with:
the error message should be "Post not found"

elements.name: Create validation error with field errors

steps.name: I have the error factory imported
I have validation errors:
I create a validation error with message "Invalid user data"
the error should have status code 400
the error meta should contain field errors
the field "email" error should be "must be valid email"
the field "age" error should be "must be at least 18"
I have the error factory imported
I create an external service error with:
the error should have status code 502
the error code should be "EXTERNAL_SERVICE_ERROR"
the error meta should contain:

elements.name: Create database error with operation context

steps.name: I have the error factory imported
I create a database error with:
the error should have status code 500
the error code should be "DATABASE_ERROR"
the error meta should contain:
I have the error factory imported
I create a not found error with:
I serialize the error to JSON
the JSON should have property "name" with value "NotFoundError"
the JSON should have property "code" with value "NOT_FOUND"
the JSON should have property "statusCode" with value "404"
the JSON should have property "message"
the JSON should have property "meta"

name: Error Factory

description:
As a developer
  I want to use the Result pattern for functional error handling
  So that I can handle errors explicitly without try-catch

steps.name: I have the Result utilities imported
I create an ok result with value "42"
the result should have ok equal to true
the result value should be "42"
I have the Result utilities imported
I create an err result with a NotFoundError
the result should have ok equal to false
the result error should be a NotFoundError
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an ok result with value "success"
I check if the result is ok
the check should return true
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an err result with an error
I check if the result is err
the check should return true
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an ok result with value "hello"
I unwrap the result
I should get the value "hello"
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an err result with a NotFoundError
I try to unwrap the result
it should throw the error
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an ok result with value "5"
I map the result to double the value
the result should be ok with value "10"
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an err result with an error
I unwrap the result with default value "fallback"
I should get the value "fallback"
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an err result with an error
I map the result to double the value
the result should still be err
the error should be preserved
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an ok result with value "user-123"
I flatMap the result to fetch user details
the result should be ok with user data
I have the Result utilities imported
I have an ok result with value "invalid-id"
I flatMap the result to fetch user details
the result should be err
the error should be a NotFoundError
I have the Result utilities imported
I have user input data:
I validate the input using Result pattern
I process the validated data
the final result should be ok
the result should contain processed user data
I have the Result utilities imported
I have user input data:
I validate the input using Result pattern
the result should be err
the error should be a ValidationError
the error should contain field errors

name: Result Pattern
